timeline.message: More optimizations after looking at hotspots
Accessors / Resolvers are no longer Components
Improve BridgeOutputBuilder to avoid proxy calls
Add PxfUserGroupInformation to the list of scanned classes for SpringBoot
Remove the remnants of singletons in the pxf code
